verses.roman:
śraddhā kari' bhaṭṭācārya saba karāila
śubhra-pīṭhopari sūkṣma vasana pātila

synonyms: śraddhā kari'-with great respect; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; saba karāila—had them all prepared; śubhra—white; pīṭha—a wooden platform; upari—over; sūkṣma—fine; vasana—cloth; pātila—spread.
translation: Thus Bhaṭṭācārya prepared a great variety of food and spread a fine cloth over a white wooden platform.
